title: Congratulating the Camillus 12U All-Star Baseball Team on capturing the District Championship
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION congratulating the Camillus 12U All-Star Baseball
Team  upon the occasion of capturing their second consecutive Tournament
Championship

WHEREAS, Excellence and success in competitive sports  can  be  achieved
only  through  strenuous  practice,  team  play  and team spirit that is
nurtured by dedicated coaching and hard work; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling in them the value of  teamwork,  encouraging  a  standard  of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play, teamwork, and competition; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize and pay
tribute  to those young people within the State of New York who, achiev-
ing outstanding success  in  athletic  competition,  have  inspired  and
brought pride to their community; and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative  Body  is justly proud to congratulate the
Camillus 12U All-Star Baseball Team upon the occasion of capturing their
second consecutive District Tournament Championship; and
  WHEREAS, To bring home a District Championship, as did the 2010 Camil-
lus All-Star Team is a wonderful achievement; the team won  five  games,
outscoring  their  opponents 80-19, en route to their second consecutive
District Championship, which culminated in a 14-3  victory  over  Canan-
daigua to win the tournament; and
  WHEREAS,  Although  the  Wildcats suffered a heartbreaking loss in the
championship game of the Western New York State  Tournament,  they  have
much  to be proud of; the Camillus 12U All-Stars proved themselves to be
one of the most successful teams in all of New York; and
  WHEREAS, No team, no matter how gifted one or a handful of its members
may be, can succeed without outstanding  talent  throughout  its  entire
roster;  such  was  the case for the 2010 Camillus 12U All-Star Baseball
Team, whose players included: Chris Petosa,  Kyle  Root,  Paul  Masello,
Andrew  Grecco,  Nick Biata, Anthony Bove, John Schad, Nick Graham, Ryan
Greco, Josh Macholl, Noah Winters, and Christian Freeman; and
  WHEREAS, The success of the team is due in great part to  the  efforts
of Head Coach Bill Biata and his outstanding Assistant Coaches Tony Bove
and  John Petosa; the team was also assisted by the never-ending encour-
agement and support of friends, family and the community; and
  WHEREAS, The 2010 Camillus 12U All-Star Baseball Team shared  notewor-
thy  attributes  off  the field, as well as in competition; individually
and collectively, they constantly exhibited good sportsmanship,  thereby
demonstrating  to  themselves  and  to others that they have an enviable
combination of talent and character which reflects favorably upon  their
community; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate the  2010  Camillus  12U  All-Star  Baseball  Team  for  an
extremely successful 2010 season; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  the members of the 2010 Camillus 12U All-Star Baseball Team
and its coaches.
